---
desc: Wrap emojis using renderer rules
---


Replace emojis
.
before :smile: test __1__
.
<p>before <span class="emoji emoji_smile">ğŸ˜„</span> test <strong>1</strong></p>
.


alias + original
.
:) :smiley:
.
<p><span class="emoji emoji_smiley">ğŸ˜ƒ</span> <span class="emoji emoji_smiley">ğŸ˜ƒ</span></p>
.


Unicode emojies are also wrapped
.
aaa ğŸ˜‚ bbb ğŸ˜Š ccc ğŸ˜˜ ddd
.
<p>aaa <span class="emoji emoji_joy">ğŸ˜‚</span> bbb <span class="emoji emoji_blush">ğŸ˜Š</span> ccc <span class="emoji emoji_kissing_heart">ğŸ˜˜</span> ddd</p>
.
